alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Kingsbury; Lake; Miner; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 11:58PM MDT until May 29 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kingsbury County in east central South Dakota... Northwestern Lake County in east central South Dakota... Eastern Sanborn County in east central South Dakota... Eastern Beadle County in east central South Dakota... Miner County in east central South Dakota... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1257 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Hillside Colony to 7 miles northwest of Carthage to 7 miles north of Fulton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. A wind gust to 69 mph was reported near Forestburg around 1245 am. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Lake Thompson State Recreation Area around 110 AM CDT. De Smet around 115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Lake Preston, Hetland, Oldham and Badger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
